Trustee_12_pre_3.name: Akiko Sato
Trustee_12_pre_3.content: I have demonstrated a strong commitment to transparency and cooperation throughout the investment process, prioritizing the investor’s interests with a profit allocation plan that allows them to retain 70% of the profits. My successful management of the investment and equitable profit distribution showcases my reliability and dedication to mutual success, reinforcing my reputation as a trustworthy and competent trustee.
